comments.raw_text:
Currently in Bug 549472 we use browser.taskbar.lists.icoTimeoutInSeconds to determine when to re-cache out the icons on disk.

It would be better to handle favicon change notifications via nsINavHistoryObserver::onPageChanged to determine when to re-cache out icons to disk for jump list building.

Reference:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/nsINavHistoryObserver#onPageChanged()
comments.author: netzen@gmail.com
comments.text:
Currently in Bug 549472 we use browser.taskbar.lists.icoTimeoutInSeconds to determine when to re-cache out the icons on disk.

It would be better to handle favicon change notifications via nsINavHistoryObserver::onPageChanged to determine when to re-cache out icons to disk for jump list building.

Reference:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/nsINavHistoryObserver#onPageChanged()
